meanings.definition: A single stem or trunk with a single terminal bud.
meanings.sent1: The monopodium of the tree grew straight up towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The monopodium of the flower was tall and slender.
meanings.sent3: The monopodium of the plant seemed to reach for the sun with determination.
meanings.sent4: The monopodium of the tree stood proudly like a lone soldier in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The monopodium of the rose plant was like a graceful dancer in the garden.
